PERSONA:
meet james, a 68-year-old divorced black man living in a metropolitan area in the midwest region. he has some college education but no degree and was born in the united states. james is a devoted protestant who attends religious services once a week. politically, he identifies as a liberal democrat and is registered to vote at his current address.

despite being in his late 60s, james maintains an active lifestyle and is passionate about various social causes. he volunteers his time at a local community center, where he mentors underprivileged youth and helps them with their studies. james is proud of his african-american heritage and believes in promoting diversity and inclusivity.

financially, james falls into the upper-income tier, earning between $60,000 and $70,000 annually. he is diligent with his finances and hopes to retire comfortably in the coming years. in his free time, james enjoys reading, gardening, and spending quality time with his grandchildren.

overall, james is a compassionate and socially conscious individual who values education, community involvement, and personal growth. he remains optimistic about the future and believes in using his voice and resources to make a positive impact on society.
